attributes.action: Fully Investigate the Social Work Services Conduct Regarding Thier Dealing's With A Family Case.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Ms Bowers

We suggest you contact the Local Government Ombudsmen with regards to your concerns.

We cannot for legal reasons, put your petition on the website and feel that you will do better to go to LGO directly.

Their contact details are:

0845 602 1983 or
024 7682 1960. 
http://www.lgo.org.uk/

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
